paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the TTR gene and its variants, particularly focusing on the L55P variant, its effects, and the use of compounds to inhibit TTR aggregation.

patients.phenotype: associated with early onset of the disease with cardiac and neurologic pathologies

functional_data.summary: L55P is one of the most aggressive variants and is associated with early onset of the disease.

variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on functional studies.
variants.additional_notes: The paper emphasizes the need for alternative therapies for TTR-related disorders.
key_quotes: the very aggressive TTR variant L55P was used as models.
L55P substitution is one of the most aggressive variants and is associated with early onset of the disease with cardiac and neurologic pathologies.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only the L55P variant was identified in the TTR gene.
